data.name: Good Pizza, Great Pizza - Premium Winter Decors 2021
data.detailed_description:
Special Premium Winter 2021 decor for Good Pizza, Great Pizza. Decorate your pizzeria with these unique one-of-a-kind items!

All items include little animations to add to the holiday cheer!

DLC pack includes:

- Gingerbread Girl wall mount: She shakes her gift in excitement and anticipation :)
- Holiday Tree MYPAD Case: Watch the Christmas lights change!
- Holiday Snow Globe counter decoration: Watch the snow fall in your little Christmas town!

Happy Holidays and a Happy New Year, Ovenists!
